name: Tanks Graveyard
description:
Edit: if you are having issues on the WEP version, please  consider download the EXE one all the issues will be fixed there, thanks;

A game made in 72 hours for the Wowie Game Jam, Failure is Progress. You have to clear all enemies  but how? 

in Tanks Graveyard you are a tank with low ammo and you are trying to win even if  that mean you will die just to reflect their own bullet to destroy them 🙂

NOTE: 

Exit button is not working sry about that😅

also if you find a bug just restart the lvl using "R"
